messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Calvin & Hobbes today, about school
messages.msgSnippet: ... That s always been one of my favorites!  Another is still pinned to my bulletin board, in which Calvin and Hobbes find a snake and wonder all sorts of
messages.messageBody:
on 1/19/03 6:24 PM, SandraDodd@... at SandraDodd@... wrote:

> http://www.ucomics.com/calvinandhobbes/
>
> Someone sent this to me. If you're not reading until monday, you might have
> to go back a day.

That's always been one of my favorites! Another is still pinned to my
bulletin board, in which Calvin and Hobbes find a snake and wonder all sorts
of things about it. Hobbes suggests getting a book at the library to find
out the answers, saying "We'll be experts! We'll learn all there is to
know!" Calvin screeches to a halt, saying "Hey, wait a minute! It's
summer! I'm on vacation! I don't want to *learn* anything!" Hobbes calmly
replies, "If nobody makes you do it, it counts as fun." In the last frame,
the two are lying on the grass with a book open before them, saying
"Cooooool!"

Hobbes is so wise.

Nancy
